name: Photon-blue olanet style.

style_setting_options.label: hidden
style_setting_options.value: .rightfixed { 		padding: 0px !important; 		width: 0px !important; 		visibility: hidden !important; 	}  	.rightfixed a.link{ 		padding: 0px !important; 		border: 0px !important; 		margin-bottom: 0px !important; 		visibility: hidden !important; 	}

style_setting_options.label: visible
style_setting_options.value: .rightfixed a {                 background: #CCCCCC !important;                 width: 100% !important;                 border: 1px solid #BBBBBB !important;                 border-right: 0px !important;                 margin-bottom: 14px !important;                 -webkit-border-radius: 5px;                 -moz-border-radius: 5px;                 border-radius: 5px;                 font-size:14px !important; 	} 	.rightfixed a:hover {                 color: #044983 !important; 	}
